UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity and mechanism of action of a novel cationic ?-helical octadecapeptide derived from ?-amylase of rice.
Literature.Author: Taniguchi M, Ochiai A, Takahashi K, Nakamichi S, Nomoto T, Saitoh E, Kato T, Tanaka T

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Eikenella corrodens ATCC 23834(no activity data),Escherichia coli NBRC 3301(IC50=326µM),Fusobacterium nucleatum ATCC 25586(IC50=168µM),Aggregatibacter actinomycetemcomitans 310a(IC50=68µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa NBRC 13275(IC50=50µM),Porphyromonas gingivalis ATCC 33277(IC50=13µM),Staphylococcus aureus NBRC 12732(IC50=181µM),Streptococcus mutans JCM 5705(IC50=77µM),Cutibacterium acnes JCM 6473(IC50=19µM),Candida albicans NBRC 1385(IC50=64µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(no activity data)
